ctrlproxy:module.name: auto-away

description.para: This module sets your IRC status to 'away' after you have been inactive('idle') for a certain period of time.

element.name: message
element.description: Message to set AWAY mode to when idle for too long.

attribute.name: time
attribute.description: Number of seconds you have to be idle before setting AWAY.

ctrlproxy:module.example:
<ctrlproxy> <plugins> <plugin autoload="1" file="auto-away"> <message time="600">I've been idle for 10 minutes, so I'm probably away. Please leave me a message. Thanks!</message> </plugin> <plugin autoload="1" file="socket"/> </plugins>
<networks> <network name="OFTC"> <servers><ipv4 host="irc.oftc.net"/></servers> <channel name="#flood.nl" autojoin="1"/> </network> </networks> </ctrlproxy>
